nodes.description: 两年前安巴尔省当地部落与政府合作对抗逊尼派极端组织，实现相对平静
nodes.support_text: Until two years ago, the Sunni insurgency was strong in Anbar province. But local Sunni tribes and their followers then turned against the militants, and began co-operating with the Iraqi government and US forces against them.

nodes.description: 拉马迪省首府发生 twin suicide blasts，造成25人死亡并重伤省级官员
nodes.support_text: A week before that, twin suicide blasts in the provincial capital Ramadi killed 25 people and severely injured regional governor Qassim Mohammed.

nodes.description: 希特镇发生针对警察的袭击，导致8人死亡
nodes.support_text: The bombing comes a week after attacks targeting police killed eight people in the town of Hit in the same province.

nodes.description: 上周安巴尔省发生四次爆炸事件，导致7人死亡，目标包括反恐高级官员Maj Walid Suleiman
nodes.support_text: Last Thursday, seven people died in four explosions, which appeared to have been caused by bombs planted at the houses of prominent policemen.

nodes.description: 当前萨克拉维耶警察局附近发生自杀式爆炸，造成7人死亡（含2名警察）、6人受伤（含1名小女孩）
nodes.support_text: Seven people have died as a suicide bomber blew up a truck near a police station in western Iraq... The bombing comes a week after attacks targeting police killed eight people in the town of Hit in the same province.

nodes.description: 安全官员确认安巴尔省近期发生的系列爆炸事件
nodes.support_text: 安全官员确认事件：Seven people's deaths and truck explosion

nodes.description: Mohammad Jassim向路透社通报爆炸事件
nodes.support_text: 发言人向路透社通报事件
法新社报道受伤女孩事件

nodes.description: 袭击者杀害了八名平民
nodes.support_text: 袭击者杀害了八名平民

nodes.description: 暴力持续上升（持续冲突事件）
伊拉克为三月大选做准备
nodes.support_text: 伊拉克为三月大选做准备

edges.support_text: Until two years ago... After a period of relative calm, the province is against suffering from mounting violence.
A week before that... The bombing comes a week after attacks targeting police killed eight people...
The bombing comes a week after attacks targeting police killed eight people... Last Thursday, seven people died in four explosions...
根据node_3支持文本中‘一周前 attacks targeting police killed eight people’与当前事件的时序关联
Last Thursday... The bombing comes a week after attacks targeting police killed eight people...
在当前萨克拉维耶警察局附近发生自杀式爆炸事件后，安全官员确认了该事件
安全官员确认事件后，发言人Mohammad Jassim向路透社通报
路透社通报后，法新社跟进报道受伤女孩事件
